transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello? Ya mam. Ya mam. Have you spoke to your? Ha my I am spoken to my owner. She told that a person should visit our showroom like that she told. Because we want through through phone it is okay to speak but directly we have to clarify lot of doubts. So we want a person to come and visit our showroom. That's what she told.
Executive: I already informed mam it is not possible.
Customer: Because why because even from different places they come and visit. But if we are paying a certain amount she is asking that we want if any clarification to be cleared you we want a person that a person should visit that's what she told. We want a field visit she told.
Executive: Your pin code is non serviceable that is the reason.
Customer: No not like that it's Cochin it's only 45 minutes from here from our location it's not even 45 minutes. So they can even for our if anywhere if they are coming near to our location know they can at least come. It won't take other than one day to come and go right? It only takes 45 minutes. Can you provide some of the managers from Cochin we can speak to them directly.
Executive: No no you tell me if it would have been any possibility then I would have not you know countered it right? I would have said that. No no I am not saying that you are countering it but we want a person like we have already spoken to some of the customer care they told that we will arrange it sir. A person will be coming that's what but you are saying that you can't. But our owner asked you remember the person from whom you have taken this plan?
Customer: I don't know it's our owner will be taking care. So yeah. So you told that told that they will be arranging.
Executive: No no mam might have came to you also for the package at the time. That's what that's what they are saying for getting money they can come why can't they come for field visit they are asking. We can't say this directly right? That's what we want a person to come directly. If you have any issues you can because we can't say directly that's what. We want a person for field visit that's it.
Executive: There is no difference or something. No it's no difference whether it is online or field visit training both are similar and trust me on the spot in real time your solutions or problem will be rendered to you right? So that is why I am saying that you can focus on online servicing only and this is only the thing because your profile is landing due according to your pin code it is non serviceable area right? So that is the reason it has been assigned to us. Am I making sense mam?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello mam am I audible?
Executive: Hello?
Executive: Mam can you hear me? Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Executive: Hello mam?
Executive: [unintelligible] hello.
Executive: Hello?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a field visit to their showroom.

- Customer mentions customer care promised a visit.



Resolution:

- Executive states field visit not possible due to pin code.

- Executive explains online servicing is similar to field visit.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- field visit, pin code, online servicing
